meanings.sent1: After eating too much candy, he ralphs all over the floor.
meanings.sent2: She felt sick and had to ralph in the bathroom.
meanings.sent3: The roller coaster made him ralph, much to the amusement of his friends.
meanings.sent4: The terrible smell made her ralph uncontrollably.
meanings.sent5: The sight and smell of the spoiled milk made him ralph violently.

meanings.definition: The name of a person or place
meanings.sent1: Ralphs is a common surname in that region.
meanings.sent2: They decided to meet at Ralphs Cafe for lunch.
meanings.sent3: The town of Ralphs Creek is known for its beautiful scenery.
meanings.sent4: She received a letter addressed to Ralphs Street.
meanings.sent5: The book was set in the fictional town of Ralphs Hollow.
